GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.10.36
GSD.description:
ext4: fix check to prevent false positive report of incorrect used inodes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.36 by commit 098b257563b959f4ca6c1d82fde0ee727792cb19, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 5012284700775a4e6e3fbe7eac4c543c4874b559. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: fix check to prevent false positive report of incorrect used inodes
